author: NASS
description:
I colorized, restored, and created a sound design for this rare footage showing Washington, D.C. in the 1940s during wartime. The film includes vibrant street scenes with pedestrians, downtown traffic, vintage cars, and everyday life in the city, followed by a long and peaceful ride through one of Washington’s parks. 

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔sound design added only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source from: Internet Archive, Accessed at United States Holocaust Memorial Museum, courtesy of Metro Theatre Center Foundation, Castle Films

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
📨 Contact me at :nassthegoodm
title: Washington DC 1940s in color, Wartime [60fps,Remastered] w/sound design added
